sentences: Oscar De La Rosa (born Oscar De La Rosa Gonzales March 29,1960) is the Tejano lead singer of the five-time Grammy Award-winning musical group La Mafia.
Mrs. Delia Guebara Owens, ex-girlfriend of Oscar and mother of his two children (Henri and Oscar Jr.), died on Friday February 27, 2009 at 4:20 PM.
On Monday May 15, 2013 Oscar De La Rosa was attacked outside a Houston bar called the Blur Bar.
